topic.title: Director Decision
topic.section: The Author can view the decision from the Track Director, the comments in Director/Author Email Record entered by the Track Director, and the uploaded Director version. The Author can also click on the email icon to generate an email to the Track Director. The Author can upload a revised version of submission or any other materials next to Upload Author Version. Once uploaded, it appears as Author Version under Director Decision and Peer Review on this page.
